interestingcomments.content:
Improve Your GoPro! /!/ Did you know you can UNLOCK more features on your current GoPro with a fancy new firmware?  You download it from GoPro Labs.  It uses QR code’s and it’ll change the way you use your camera big time.  Check it out in this weeks Creative Video Tips!
https://youtu.be/hj7HwElr3NY
